Posts.Content: Hi all just been reading Jmp post about how you had cellulitis if you read my post you see my daughters on going journey with A/ even though got all clear 2 weeks ago for some reason a mild fungal infection that was near the catheter site on her tummy has now spread and 2 days ago GP said internal infection been back today he says he thinks cellulitis it's in groin and on thigh he given more antibiotics bug ask for blood test tommorow and she says if cellulitis treat at home anything else it intravenous in hospital bless her  having enough stress with a back to work meeting Monday that she worrying about if it is cellulitis is it a common problem with Cancer side effects and how long before meds start to work . She hoping to go back work next week although if meeting on Monday I said that she should go the following week xxxx
